template.name: Turret
template.parameter: const int type_turret, const int coord_x_turret, const int coord_y_turret

template.name: Enemy
template.parameter: const enemy_int id, const int type

template.name: EnemyP

query.formula: A<> forall (i: int[0, 2]) main_tower_reached_time[i] != 0 && main_tower_reached_time[i] <= 25 * 3 + 3 * i

A[] forall(i: enemy_int) (coord_x[i] == 0 && coord_y[i] == 0) || (coord_x[i] == 0 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 0 && coord_y[i] == 2) || (coord_x[i] == 0 && coord_y[i] == 3) || (coord_x[i] == 0 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 1 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 2 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 3 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 4 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 5 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 6 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 2) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 3) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 5) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 6) || (coord_x[i] == 7 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 8 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 8 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 9 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 9 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 10 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 10 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 10 && coord_y[i] == 5) || (coord_x[i] == 10 && coord_y[i] == 6) || (coord_x[i] == 10 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 11 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 11 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 11 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 12 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 12 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 12 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 13 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 13 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 13 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 14 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 14 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 14 && coord_y[i] == 7) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 1) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 2) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 3) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 4) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 5) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 6) || (coord_x[i] == 15 && coord_y[i] == 7)

query.comment: if the main_tower_life_points is always >= 0 means the one chosen is a winning configuration We can also ask
